website_summaries.verdict: Delivering midrange features at an entry-level price, the Alcatel OneTouch Idol 3 is the company's best smartphone to date -- and a great deal for the money.
pros: The mega-affordable Alcatel OneTouch Idol 3 has a large screen and takes nice outdoor photos
It wins bonus points for loud external speakers and a useful mode to use the OS upside-down as well as right-side-up
cons: Its performance is a little sluggish, its low-light photography is poor and the OS lacks a few useful shortcuts common to other Android phones

customer_reviews.title: Alcatel ruined this phone... It was a decent budget device, now poisoned with bloatware.
customer_reviews.text: AVOID THIS PHONE. Alcatel sent out an update (7VGS-UES6) which loads this phone with useless garbage and a file manager that wastes resources and constantly reactivates regardless of force quit. Even with all it's permissions cancel it still restarts and tries to advertise another useless app. I used to very much like this phone and posted a review in that regard saying that I didn't expect to need a new phone anytime soon, but now I probably need to buy a new phone all together because this is a polluted hunk of junk thanks to the people who made it and I will never buy another Alcatel device after this.
customer_reviews.author: Alpha2

customer_reviews.title: If there were ZERO stars...
customer_reviews.text: ...that's what I'd give this horrible phone. First of all, the product description is misleading. This is NOT a new unlocked phone! I received a used, dusty Cricket phone that did not work on my TMobile network. Discovered that these phones were manufactured for Cricket in 2016, so I should have done more research. Bottom line, a total rip off and sent back. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: TJML14

customer_reviews.title: Best budget midrange phone at an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I purchased, one for each parent. Since the price had dropped significantly it was a steal. At under $200 this phone is a solid buy. So far it's up to Marshmallow, and has a great screen, great performance, and amazing dual front facing speakers. Battery like is solid and the added benefit of expandable storage with a very stock interface (after adding the Google launcher) are an added bonus. The only issue with this phone is the camera. It's slow, and in medium to low light blurring does occur. I expect this from a phone at this price, but if you have decent light and steady hands you can take average photos.
customer_reviews.author: Cars and Tech by JDM City

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone a few days ago, I am having trouble with the Bluetooth staying connected to my car, and selecting music. I fin I have to charge the phone two to three times in a day. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nikota S Scofield

customer_reviews.title: A very good phone at a very good price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! This is a well built phone with all the features from a premium phone. The phone is thin and easy to hold. The screen is bright and clear. The wifi access is good. The camera is decent too. The operating system is close to vanilla android with very little changes. This makes it a breeze to use. The User interface is fast and slick too. So lags what so ever. I did have a small issue with the tray that loads the sim and microsd card and I do not know if it was the SDcard or the tray that was was slightly out of proportions.
customer_reviews.author: Ramki

customer_reviews.title: I actually like this phone a lot
customer_reviews.text: I actually like this phone a lot. It has many interesting features that I like. For example, the music app with the built-in DJ features is really fun to use. The camera and the processing speed isn't great, but that is expected with a phone at this price. I don't know if the phone is really sturdy or if its the screen protector and case I bought for the phone. I dropped this phone countless times from various height onto various surfaces, and phone cosmetically still looks brand new. I would say if you're on a budget and big music listener, this phone may fulfill those needs
customer_reviews.author: G DUB R

customer_reviews.title: Loved it...not much now.
customer_reviews.text: The best mid range smart phone on the market. Bought this for my mother-in-law and its been an amazing performer. Great display..camera..size..she absolutely loves it. Update: 11-20-2016 Just purchased another of these phones in September to replace the original one because the screen was broken. One morning a week ago my mother- in- law woke up and the phone no longer works. It's about a month past the return date and the phone is now being sold for almost twice what we paid for it. If a new battery doesn't fix this dead phone issue we r sick with a new phone that doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: The phone worked well enough.......
customer_reviews.text: until I sat on it one month later but wait i paid for an Asurion 2 year accident protection plan ??? I have the receipt's for the phone and protection plan i bought from Amazon. Asurion says i don't have a protection plan and Amazon will not call me back
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: The middle is good, the price is better!
customer_reviews.text: The screen is very bright and sharp but not as colorful as a Super AMOLED screen. The speakers are very loud and clear. compared to others. There is processor lag when overloaded with tasks. I don't mind not having a fingerprint sensor because this is a mid range phone after all. Camera is pretty good. I prefer polished aluminum but the design of this plastic phone is very beautiful. Good durability in my opinion when properly cased AND screen protected of course. Has survived many drops from my kiddos. The user interface is almost stock Android, very easy to navigate. This is a perfect starter phone for a younger adolescent,older adult or daily user on the go.
customer_reviews.author: darryl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value. Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value. Great phone. Great reception. Excellent display. Good speakers. Updates are a bit flaky. First one messed up texting functionality and the third threw my phone into an endless reboot cycle. I ended up booting in safe mode, and eventually got the phone to boot again without having to wipe it. Sharing videos over email is still broken, which is very annoying. Maybe the next update will fix it. Only downside of this device is that it doesn't ship with stock Android, although it's pretty close (very few software enhancements and no bloatware).
customer_reviews.author: Chompy

customer_reviews.title: This is a great phone. Sound Quality is great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone. Sound Quality is great, the stripped down Android OS was perfect for me as I am a programmer and am making my own apps on the device. The drivers being built into the phone is a cool feature. The flip around feature on the phone is fun to use at parties. Battery life is about a day of heavy use. The only real drawbacks of the phone have been the inability to disassemble the phone without voiding the warranty. I'd give this phone 5 stars if it were able to be taken apart to replace the battery easily.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Flick

customer_reviews.title: ... is comparable in quality to a Samsung and I like the resolution and sound quality
customer_reviews.text: While the phone is comparable in quality to a Samsung and I like the resolution and sound quality, I have found that Alcatel software is not compatible with my banking app. This was verified by my bank technical service department. I attempted to contact Alcatel for help. After a month I finally received an email from an Alcatel CSM stating " it may not work with all 3rd party apps". Unfortunately, that's an app I need to use. Steer clear of this phone brand if you need to use a banking app! Or need a responsive customer service department.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Good phone, broken OS and bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone in July of 2015, and I loved it so much, but I do speak of it in the past tense for a reason. The beginning of June 2016 it died on me. The phone is now just boot loops every time I try to turn it on. I tried to get ahold of the customer service, and they tried to talk me through resetting it through the boot menu(which I had already done), and the call dropped, and they never called me back. I would love to give it a better review, but less then a year later it is as good as a brick.
customer_reviews.author: JaffaIota

customer_reviews.title: Flagship-feel phone at flip phone price
customer_reviews.text: Got this when my Nexus 5 died and was amazed at the progress made in android phones since I got the N5 a year ago. For less than half the price of my N5 I got a phone with comparable screen, better battery (being able to charge my phone 1/day is a game changer), better speakers, better camera. Granted the Idol doesn't have the benchmarks of the N5 (or the ZenPhone2) but I haven't noticed it at all in everyday use. If you want a great unlocked phone (with all the GSM LTE bands) and don't want to pay $600, get this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Boyd

customer_reviews.title: You should buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I offers more than any other phone alone or together. Speed, look, one can answer in any side. Has an excellent look. Light and thin. A 5.5 display, wide front camera - has a great back camera. On top the Audio Mix - has an excellent crystal sound on 5.1 stereo and great great headphones. On top, it offers more than iPhone 6 on $250. After a day paying with it - a friend of mine - just garbed it from me. Now I have to boy another one :). Currently I have an Idol 2 - but Idol 3 is much more advanced. I recommend it to all.
customer_reviews.author: Seremb Gjergji

customer_reviews.title: As good as an iPhone for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for price. Thin, great battery life, sharp and bright screen. This not a low end phone as price would suggest. You can get half a dozen of these for the price of an Iphone. My wife has had one for a year with no issues so I replaced my Fire phone with one to get the larger screen. Fire phone still has the best interface. Wish Amazon had keep up development on it
customer_reviews.author: Gearcrasher

customer_reviews.title: If you like big screens,  look no further
customer_reviews.text: I am on a iPhone 5s currently, which I use for my daily use and workouts, coz of the small size. But because of that I am not able to read properly. So, instead of getting a tablet I opted for the idol 3, given the price and good screen size. I am happy with it. I use it for reading and the size is just right. +great screen and brightness +decent battery +speakers are excellent +included JBL earphones are very good +premium finish +very thin bezel all around. -Slippery in my hands, needs a case for sure -there's an ever so slight delay, not bothersome, but it's a tad slow if you are coming from a snapdragon 801/805 processor.
customer_reviews.author: Ashok Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Super value
customer_reviews.text: About as good value for money as there is on the current market. Lacks only a high-end processor (only important if you play demanding video games- I don't play any), and a few of those unnecessary "features" the big boys like to promote, to be equal to current flagships at almost 3x the price. Has all frequencies for AT&T and T Mobile, including LTE band 12 for the latter (which few other unlocked phones have at this point). Build quality is very good and the display is gorgeous. If you want a phablet don't even think twice, just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen LaBonne

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone!
customer_reviews.text: Really good phone for the price ($99.99) the phone works well and I am very satisfied with my purchase. The phone has 13mp back camera and it can shoot 1080p HD videos. My service provider is Metro PCS and they were able to activate my phone without any trouble. However I paid a $25 activation fee because I had to purchase a new sim card. Overall i am happy with the phone and i hope it will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Matt G

customer_reviews.title: No better bargain out there!
customer_reviews.text: If you are in the market for a smartphone (even if your not) and you're thinking $600-700 for the one that has the features you want, look no further. If you don't take advantage of the Alcatel one touch idol 3 for $249.00 including free shipping, you will be missing out on the best deal going right now. Why buy a V12, when a V8 will do the job just fine and looking very stylish too. I've had mine a few days and it does everthing it says in all the videos and reviews and very well I think. Save some money! Isn't that what it's all about.
customer_reviews.author: White

customer_reviews.title: ALCATEL OneTouch works for me...
customer_reviews.text: Received on time as promised in perfect condition. Set build quality and performance can not be beat at twice twice the price. Dual front facing speakers are great! Streaming videos flow smoothly along with web access. Email set up and contacts worked flawlessly. Battery life is good to excellent. My usage net a day and a half to two days before needing to recharge. On occasion have gotten into middle of third day. Unit out the box had Display set at about 60%. This looks great but I find that about 25% works for me. Should have purchased this set months ago.
customer_reviews.author: TonyJ66

customer_reviews.title: Best Bargain Smartphone!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for great price! You get an awesome 5.5 inch display, crisp loud front facing jbl speakers, free quality jbl ear buds and a fast phone that can easily rival the Samsung Galaxy S5! I received my phone this morning and simply can't put it down! I sat my wife next to me so we can enjoy this beauty together lol...the front facing speakers really make a difference. I doubt I'll ever go back to a back facing speakers phone. Alcatel really did us all a favor with this awesome beast! Can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Great Smart Phone for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I Love the Simplicity of this phone and even though its kind of big but it feels good in hand ....Performance is Awesome after upgrading it to marshmallow....Both rear and front cameras are performing well and it did capture good pics in good light conditions but its kind of ok when u don't have adequate lights.... The Call quality is good and audio quality is great but got disappointed when it didn't arrive with the JBL headset (that's why the 4 Star)....overall i am satisfied with the purchase and i would recommend to everyone who wants to have a good smart phone for the daily use........
customer_reviews.author: Karthik C

customer_reviews.title: Screen Issues is bound to Occur so don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Initially the phone was good but after few months it started acting up. Main issue I have seen is the bottom panel of the screen sensor wont work after a while, I have googled regarding this issue and notices that there are many people who have faced the same issue. Amazon wont come for help! so now have to deal with manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: HSom

customer_reviews.title: Still happy
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! Worth every penny! Update..... After having the phone six months, it stopped working randomly one day. I tried plugging it into a charger and the only thing it would do was power cycle itself continuously. I reached out to Alcatel via e mail to no avail. I decided to send one last e mail threatening a report to the Better Business Bureau and I magically received 4 e mails in response from4 different people. Huh..... Long story short, they paid to ship the phone back to them to get fixed and it turns out they couldn't, so they have me a new one at no cost. It took a bit but they made right in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: PHONE IS DICONTINUED NO HELP WHEN YOU HAVE A PROBLEM
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone for overseas travel. Screen was not responsive. After i contacted Alcatel they told me phone was discontinued so no replacement or simply put toss the phone
customer_reviews.author: emma

customer_reviews.title: This phone worked fantastic for about 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This phone worked fantastic for about 6 months. Now it's constantly having issues functioning and seems to be progressively getting worse. Little to no updates from the company. Sorry but I definitely won't ever purchase another phone made my this company.
customer_reviews.author: JackTheRipper

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is great, one of my favorite phones
customer_reviews.text: Far better than my Galaxy s4 or note 2, much better battery and faster than either I have a lot of apps, and it is not laggy at all, but I use Nova launcher which is great The only negative is that the double tap function often does not work. I don't know if this is a phone issue or Android or Novalauncher.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone with a couple of small issues.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great phone, fast, decent battery life with a great screen. I don't care for the double tap on option, The phone will butt dial people when in my pocket much more often than my previous LG phone with double tap on. The stock Alcatel Android set-up needs a little maturing for my tastes, so I installed Nova launcher and am using a lock screen option. This makes the phone experience better,
customer_reviews.author: brokenwave

customer_reviews.title: ALL 4 OF OUR ALCATEL SCREENS BROKE IN UNDER A YEAR
customer_reviews.text: Me and all my 4 sibling had this same model phone and they only last after a year because they are very easy to crack the screen from normal use not even from dropping it. My sister's screen broke from just walking around with it in her jeans pocket... Poor quality if every single one of our phones broke!
customer_reviews.author: gamergirl

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Just make sure to get a case and tempered glass screen protector, because many reviews state the glass is low quality, and the phone is slippery. Here are some things I'd like to see in an Idol 4. Better camera quality Better build quality (Includes screen) Less lag Android Marshmallow If those issues were improved/fixed, this phone would surely be one of the best on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy the Cat

customer_reviews.title: It's a decent phone and very attractive looking. Coming ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent phone and very attractive looking. Coming from using an S5 Galaxy, it's lacks many custom features on the messaging app that comes by default on S5. Can't personalize view, can't schedule text messaging, very limited message size - etc. The camera on the ph lacks decent zoom. Otherwise, there is nothing wrong with this phone from a hardware perspective.
customer_reviews.author: Luls Robs

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone thats lightweight, thin, comfortable, and has a beautiful display, loud front facing speakers, fast processor, and nice premium desing. It foes get a little hot, but if you throw a case on it its fine. Also, the packaging is really nice. The included jbl headphones are really good
customer_reviews.author: kokakolaman

customer_reviews.title: Broke in under 24 hours - Expensive to repair
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when this phone arrived at my door. I took a nap after getting my service transferred. When I woke up the screen had a crack so deep it no longer functioned. Every repair shop told me the parts were hard to get and expensive for them. I had to buy another phone. I would reccomend either a more durable phone or a cheaper one to repair. A shake too, otherwise a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Corey

customer_reviews.title: The screen is quite good, and it handles most of my daily tasks ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very capable phone. The screen is quite good, and it handles most of my daily tasks without issue. I have found that the Outlook app occasionally slows down dramatically and is unusable, and requires the phone to be rebooted. But other than that, the battery life is adequate for a full day under moderate-to-heavy use, even when travelling, and I have encountered no red flags with this device. It's a pleasure to use and a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Flink

customer_reviews.title: But the face chat is not that great. I didn't have any complaints until I called ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything positive that has been said about this phone is true. But the face chat is not that great. I didn't have any complaints until I called my friend and we chatted over the video phone camera. And I don't know why but when I go to google images, the pixels on the images are pretty bad. I've never had issues with that on any phone, and I've had the Alcatel fierce 2. So I gave it 3 stars for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: An Rose

customer_reviews.title: Unlocked???
customer_reviews.text: Just received my phone. It says Cricket on the back. My old sim card is a ATT one. Why isn't the phone working. I thought this was an unlocked phone?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good phone
customer_reviews.text: Very good device I've had it for a few days so far so good. I love the speakers and the screen and front facing Speaker's are awesome for media comsuption and getting LTE on ATT by way of straight talk. All in all if your looking for a phone that's tech heavy that you can root and play graphic heavy games without lag get he asus 4gb or the one plus , but if you just like me just wanted a good around phone that has a beautiful screen and great speakers and get LTE and a good battery life get this
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Great critical reviews and good value!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after reading great reviews and I couldn't be more satisfied for the price. This phone's sound is unbelievable, and the screen is every bit as good as my Galaxy S4. Very lightweight for the large size. Love that I can add/change memory card via a pop-out tray on the side. One potential drawback for heavy phone users is nonremovable batter, but great for average phone use, music, podcasts and video. Good camera with plenty of options, too. Unlike some lower-priced phones, has latest version of Lollipop.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price.mysic sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Live the phone. Good reception not much bloatware . sluggish occasionally. Performance is great when not multitasking a lot. Camera is good.looks great I put a green slick wrap on mine. I'm happy with mine I upgraded slightly from an huawei ascend mate 2 because I'm tired of jellybean. Great for listening to music.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Barton

customer_reviews.title: Questionable Alcatel quality
customer_reviews.text: Though packaged as a new phone. this one was defective. Emitted static opening and closing each app or when plugging in the headphones and would not maintain connection to cell tower even though activated in an area with solid signal strength. After lengthy chat session with Amazon tech help, technician determined phone was bad. Returned, will replace with different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: This really is an amazing phone! I made the shift from an iPhone 4s 3 mos. ago and have enjoyed the learning curve from iOS to android with the Idol 3. It's kept up with day to day processes and battery life has been great. Its a bit oversensitive at times, meaning it'll activate apps on its own, but not a dealbreaker. I've gotten a lot of compliments on the looks of this idol3 and for the price I'm very happy! By the way, it takes decent pics too!
customer_reviews.author: frontslide9

customer_reviews.title: The Best you can buy for that price!
customer_reviews.text: Alcatel one touch Idol 3 is a differential smartphone, its quality is outstanding like a flagship must be, the reversible function and the dual frontal speakers JBL made this phone perfect for gaming, its processor and ram didn't let you down in the most of the high end games, the panel of the screen just seen awesome, very good colors, saturation am brightness, and the cameras are worthy for the price 👍 I have now a few months with the phone and is running marshmallow fast and fluid like the first day. Plus... The smartphone it's really beauty, more that what it seems in the photos, have really elegant and elite looks!
customer_reviews.author: Eymar

customer_reviews.title: VERY IMPRESSED,,,,,,,,
customer_reviews.text: BEST SMARTPHONE IVE OWNED , AND THE 1080 DISPLAY IS VERY GOOD...AND THE SPEAKER SYSTEM IS EXCELLENT... DONT UNDERSTAND WHY THERE IS NEGATIVE REVIEWS UNLESS THE PHONE GOT DAMAGED OR THE SELLER WAS THIRD RATE... MINE WORKS FINE, AND IVE HAD SOME HIGH END SAMSUNG ANDROID PHONES....
customer_reviews.author: tarheel

customer_reviews.title: GET IT.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! Coming from a Windows phone (barely any app service) I was ready to take anything Android or iPhone. DO NOT REGRET my choice. The speakers make it so that it competes with any Samsung or iPhone phone, it doesn't have cheap quality sound like most low end androids. I wasn't sure if getting an Alcatel phone was something wise, but it keeps up. As a college student I need accessibility and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Fabi

customer_reviews.title: Decent specced phone but some hardware drawbacks to be aware of.
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are great. 2 bad sides are that the screen is humped over the speakers so the screen would get scratched easily. The second is that when switching from earpiece to speakerphone, there is a 10 second blank delay where you can't hear the other person, but they can hear you.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Burress

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone for the price! Huge screen, beautiful, very light and the best speakers in a phone. Also the speakers are up and down and front facing so if you use it landscape mode you get excellent stereo (and loud) sound (e.g., for videos).
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone!! I wanted a phone that was not too expensive, was large, and was Android 5. I did extensive research and was led to this phone. I was not familiar with the brand, but it has proved to be a wise choice. This is my first cell phone and I am happy to not have to use my teens phone.The value for the price is exceptional. If you are on the fence, don't be. This is the one
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte

customer_reviews.title: I love how big it is
customer_reviews.text: My siblings, coworkers, and even my friends wants to buy this phone from me as soon as I unbox it and setting up the phone. I love how big it is, the system runs smooth and its everything it says on the description. I love the phone and fits my style for a great price. :)
customer_reviews.author: Alfred

customer_reviews.title: This is a phone that I have thoroughly enjoyed. I have been a buyer of Alcatel phone ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a phone that I have thoroughly enjoyed. I have been a buyer of Alcatel phone for the last few years and have been happy with their product. However, this phone is one of their best. The only problem I've had seen doing a software update is when the ringer turns itself down to soft which makes hearing a call coming in very difficult to receive. I'm not saying this is normal, but, it has happened with the phone I just received. Amazon has been amazing in the fact that they are replacing my phone due to the circumstances. It is worth its cost and more. You can't go wrong with buying this phone.
customer_reviews.author: LADARTHA

customer_reviews.title: Speakers are great on this thing best speakers I heard in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Speakers are great on this thing best speakers I heard in a cell phone. Camera looks great also has very good photos. No lagging that I can notice got in on the preorder price of $200 so its a steal for this unlocked phone. I never heard of Alcatel before and I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: zach seelbaugh

customer_reviews.title: BEST Smartphone!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these about 6 months ago as upgrades to our older flip phones. Cannot tell you how happy we've been with our purchase! We couldn't be more pleased with these phones!!! We added 8 GB SanDisk micro SD cards to them.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Perry

customer_reviews.title: Why buy an overpriced 600+ smartphone?
customer_reviews.text: This phone is awesome, I upgraded my unlocked iPhone 4s to this one. The screen is amazing, sounds is awesome. I do not regret purchasing this phone, and considering all other phones this quality are usually 600+ its a steal. I highly recommend purchasing this phone if you want awesome resolution and graphics. Some people says its a bit laggy but i disagree. Everything works fast and efficient. 250 dollars is a steal, plus the headphones that came with them are Great!
customer_reviews.author: buyer 1

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: So far the phone has worked great, has great battery life!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Carey

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great phone but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic phone in this age of super costly and super spec'ed phones. But I am having problem with my WiFi radio and it does a very bad job when I move away from the router. Anything out of the 10sqft area and it will drop a connection. Google Wifi at Starbucks is fussy too. Can anyone help or have a suggestion what to do? I did ask Amazon but they did not help except ask me to return.
customer_reviews.author: Shimpa

customer_reviews.title: Common problem for this phone
customer_reviews.text: After using the phone for about 9 months, the phone started to have shut off and started problem. Since it is under warranty, I sent it back and have it fixed. After 2 months, my phone was freezing on me. I need to send in and have it fixed again before the warranty expires. When I searched the web, it is a common problem of this phone. I will not recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Chi Wong

customer_reviews.title: Tmobile Band 12 LTE disabled in recent patch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone because it was capable of supporting 700mhz band 12 LTE which has better building penetration. Unfortunately, Alcatel was unable to design the phone to support VoLTE, and realized it only after marketing the phone to be compliant. The entire band 12 must be disabled to prevent a situation where the user would be unable to reach emergency services. The phone has lost a lot of value in my eye as a result. If I had known that band 12 would it be supported, I would have purchased a different phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad phone but if you get the tinyest crack in ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad phone but if you get the tinyest crack in the screen it renders the entire touch screen useless and becoming a $100 paperweight. For the price I would understand using smaller less expensive equipment in the phone but I thought they would've had a better screen and digitizer on this phone...
customer_reviews.author: Nathanial H.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The big screen is nice, but the phone itself is so slow and sometimes shuts itself down which is really annoying. I also hate that the button to turn the screen on is on the left and the volume on the right. It's backwards from every other phone I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: OK phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a ok phone. I got this phone in early offer for 200 dollar promotion. The phone comes with bells and whistles including headphones.After three week of use half of the touch screen stop responding. The full battery last for about 8 hours in regular use with occasional 1-2 mins video. I have noticed some problem while making call like other party don't hear you when you are talking. (occasional).
customer_reviews.author: TUKE

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful well performing android
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful well performing android. Processor is quick, takes decent pictures, and display is very nice. However, the home button stopped working after 11 months of use. Now, cannot let the phone go into sleep mode or let the battery die because it won't come back on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Overall this phone is a good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Overall this phone is a good value for money. I personally believe most of the current very "few" issues are due to buggy lollipop not the hardware of this phone. Battery life and Screen can beat the crap out of any phone on market. I dont think its a sluggish phone by any sense. A little hiccup here and there is okay for a normal user. I tried playing few games as well , could not find any lag. For $200 its equal to any phone which is right now for $400
customer_reviews.author: Panchu

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone to start...but
customer_reviews.text: Was a really great phone to start with, good photos, snappy response, played music well. But less than a year in I now have a battery that doesn't read at all (plugged in it goes into a reboot loop where I have to coax it back to life by hitting power button a bunch), a power button that doesn't respond unless I hit it like 30 times & inconsistent apps response. To boot for some reason this phone has always specifically hated yelp.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Bartnik

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone
customer_reviews.text: Is an acceptable phone considering it costs about 140 dollarsOctacore Nice speakers (JBL) Acceptable screen. Android 6 I havethis phone about a month, and restart only once. I don't know what will happen in the future, but is enough phone for me.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Mattera

customer_reviews.title: This phone is awesome. Best battery life on any phone I've ever ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is awesome. Best battery life on any phone I've ever used and I've used alot of them. The battery tends to last me 3 days with light use and 2 with heavy. The cameras are both pretty impressive for the price, the processor handles every game I play without any hiccups but it does come off a little sluggish outside of the games. Aside from the icons, this phone is basically pure android. I've thoroughly enjoyed it, its the best electronic device I've ever paid 250 for but if you are pure android lover and a power user, you'll enjoy this as a back up to a nexus.
customer_reviews.author: edward

customer_reviews.title: The BEST smartphone in its price range
customer_reviews.text: Incredible phone and the best for its price. It does everything your average smartphone user wants and does it well. Clean stock android, great screen, and the best speakers I've heard on a smartphone. (Seriously these things are loud). I couldn't see anyone being disappointed with recieving this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Quesada

customer_reviews.title: Crashes and reboots frequently. In Whatsapp, it hangs ...
customer_reviews.text: Crashes and reboots frequently. In Whatsapp, it hangs when viewing an image... slow. Screen already has a break without dropping it, and it has a rubber protector. Worst, a hairline break on the screen has made the keyboard useless, can't return phone... it's dead in only 35 days... I made a mistake buying it...
customer_reviews.author: Jose M.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I just got a replacement of this device and it auto restarts like crazy......I wish I didn't have to have this phone anymore
customer_reviews.author: sumtingwongmang

customer_reviews.title: Alcatel one Touch Idol 4G
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the Alcatel Idol, it meets all my needs. It's a very SMART phone. The only downside is a non replaceable battery. By the time it would need a new battery, it's time to upgrade the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Zipp

customer_reviews.title: One Touch Idol 3 Has Stolen My Heart!
customer_reviews.text: This Smartphone has met My expectations and then some. It is extremely fast and does what it says, this was a upgrade from My last Alcatel, it was well worth the money when considering other high end Smartphones. I highly recommend this phone to anyone who wants to upgrade without the big price tag. 5 Stars To Alcatel.!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cameo Girl

customer_reviews.title: Failed
customer_reviews.text: the root menu buttons sudendly failed after only 4 month of normal usage; now I cannot use the bottom of the screen. The reversible fonction works, but it is uncomfortable because of the location of the power and volume, so I'm using a virtual menu App.
customer_reviews.author: silvanojose1

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, great battery.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! Great battery! Highly recommend. Don't buy cheap Chinese brands. I bought 2 chinese brands from amazon and one lasted one year, the other only a few months. Buy the Alcatel.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Bought it as a gift from a relative. He ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift from a relative. He loves its there is direct feedback from him 1. Light Weight 2. Fit well in the pocket 3. Batter last really well.
customer_reviews.author: msa

customer_reviews.title: Third smart phone. Best so far.
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone. Had a iPhone 4 and galaxy s3. This Alcatel is better in every way. Battery, speakers, flip screen. Etc. If I ever need I'll be buying Alcatel again.
customer_reviews.author: Newfie dude

customer_reviews.title: WORKS UNTIL WARRANTY RUNS OUT
customer_reviews.text: Works until the warranty runs out then it does nothing at all. It will not text or call. Do not buy this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: nebbyKnezzar

customer_reviews.title: Pretty ok phone.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little phone for the price. A bit fragile though. Get a case and screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: phone power now dog.
customer_reviews.text: well love the phone just wish some one would come up with a battery case for it, maybe one with wireless charging. it seems like a no brainer for all these phablets.
customer_reviews.author: frogola

customer_reviews.title: Why buy anything else???
customer_reviews.text: Honestly will never buy a NAME brand phone again. My wife and I go through phones. You know the $600+ ones about every 6 months. This phone is faster than my LG G4, my Galaxy s6, and her Galaxy Note 4. Just plain and simple phone that does everything well.
customer_reviews.author: scot seay

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I'll never buy a ridiculously expensive phone again! Hopefully they keep producing this quality at a reasonable price. I'm just an average daily user and I've found no fault at all with this device.
customer_reviews.author: Yinzer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Mom loves it as a replacement for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Mom loves it as a replacement for her Moto G. Love the stock version of Android -- it's super fast and smooth and the screen is perfect in quality and size for her.
customer_reviews.author: Shishir Tandale

customer_reviews.title: Very slick looking phone.
customer_reviews.text: Came in two days. We ordered it for our younger cousin. So far so good. We may update once she gets it turned on and going. But you shouldn't get much complaint from a 16 yr old. lol
customer_reviews.author: TeamHawkins

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: used it for a year then all of a sudden half the screen stop working.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the uncertain techie
customer_reviews.text: My first smart phone. It will take me a while to use all its capacity. I just heard about an app that is a magnifier, which I really need. Asking "Okay Google" has replaced Wikipedia as my new helpmate. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: June Niece

customer_reviews.title: It is well designed and feels good on hand
customer_reviews.text: This is a very decent phone for the price. It is well designed and feels good on hand. It is not $700 phone so don't expect a flagship phone.
customer_reviews.author: TO9

customer_reviews.title: Great smart phone.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for a good price. Nice and loud JBL speakers. My complaint I have is how the SIM and mSD card is inserted.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: This is great for a budget phone. Gorgeous display. If you are on the fence about this phone, just go ahead and get it. Can't go wrong for 250 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Richarda

customer_reviews.title: Best budget phone!
customer_reviews.text: Buy from $100 worth the money! Speaker is great , and can upgrade to 6.0. Available language is not enough. No other problem yet
customer_reviews.author: cho

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't hold signal in my area...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return, wouldn't maintain quality signal in my area. To bad because I saw the potential and the sound quality on wi-fi was fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: D C Short

customer_reviews.title: Issues from the start
customer_reviews.text: Have only had this phone for sub two weeks and have had nothing but issues out of the box. Constant freezing and crashing, i cant even use certain apps, my photos don't load and the phone straight up goes black screen and restarts at least once a day. Very unhappy customer at this point in time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: for 250 this phone is pretty good i wanted to buy an unlocked phone that ...
customer_reviews.text: for 250 this phone is pretty good i wanted to buy an unlocked phone that i can use with any gsm carrier i feel i made the right choice with this, coming from an iphone 6 plus you can tell its a little slower when browsing the web but the rest is fine with me i also love that i can extend my memory with an sd card, i am also happy this has lte im paying $35 A MONTH now for unl talk n text and 2gb of LTE cant beat that
customer_reviews.author: glopez

customer_reviews.title: Everything you would hope for
customer_reviews.text: No complaints except that the android version probly won't change. Wish I hadn't used a bad charger and messed mine up.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Brown

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! It's a used Cricket Wireless phone. Came dead on arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone! I am ec Extremely pleased with my ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone! I am ec Extremely pleased with my purchase if it and so glad I did some research and feel like I bought the best possible phone for the money spent. Very sturdy, actually comes with an instruction book and great headphones. So much better than ibuds! This is my first android phone and so not have any regrets! Highly recommend! I
customer_reviews.author: georgia00

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and capable at affordable price
customer_reviews.text: It is a great phone that exceeded my expectations. The stock camera app cannot lock the focus under indoor lighting. But I solved the problem by downloading a free app "A Better Camera". An added bonus, I now have descent cellular signal that my previous 3 phones couldn't get in my office. Very satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: N. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Screen to be tougher
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone but when I got the case I had the phone in my pocket while riding my bike it came out fell to the ground and broke the screen
customer_reviews.author: Florentino M.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: So far I am loving this phone. Can't find anything bad to say.
customer_reviews.author: Diane K

customer_reviews.title: ... my new Alcatel one touch idol 3 and was happy with it for about an hour until I tried ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received my new Alcatel one touch idol 3 and was happy with it for about an hour until I tried taking a video and during playback the audio was muffled and cut in and out because microphones don't pick up noises that are on the quite side. I think it has a background noise cancelling feature built into the microphone but they cut out to much noise and there's no option to adjust sensitivity, or they just put crappy microphones in the phone to cut cost. Other than that everything else was good about the phone but the bad microphones were a deal breaker for me, I sent mine back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not for my network
customer_reviews.text: It seemed like a nice phone, but it wouldn't work with my phone provider
customer_reviews.author: David Byrnes

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived two days early. Great buy so far, still need to take photos. Good battery life on SB. No option to turn off swipe to open. Needs slim case, very slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Yogihana

customer_reviews.title: Good phone!
customer_reviews.text: Great budget phone, nice screen, pretty quick and very little bloatware, most of what is there can be uninstalled.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Ensey

product_meta.title: Alcatel Idol 3 6045O (16GB, 2GB RAM) 5.5" Full HD Display, Dual Cameras, 2910 mAh Battery, 4G LTE GSM Unlocked Smartphone (Black)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackA SUPERPHONE FOR THE PRICE OF A SMARTPHONE - The award-winning ALCATEL ONETOUCH IDOL 3 Smartphone offers a superphone experience, priced for the everyday smartphone user. IDOL 3 packs a powerful 3-in-1 experience, with great sound, Full HD display and industry-leading camera. Enjoying music with IDOL 3 is a whole new experience, featuring unmatched sound quality and clarity with dual front-facing speakers from JBL audio, including Clari-Fi technology by Harman. The 5.5-inch Full HD display offers stunning picture and videos from any viewing angle - even in direct sunlight - thanks to the vivid cinematic color experience with Technicolor Color Enhance technology. And never worry about missing any of life's moments with its fast Face Focus and wide-angle front camera.
feature_bullets: The IDOL 3 comes integrated with LTE data speeds. LTE is up to 2X faster than standard 4G when using data on your phone. If you want to stream music, or download a show, or even watch a weather update… No worries, our IDOL 3 has you covered with LTE.

True to life music featuring JBL audio with award-winning JBL audio, IDOL 3 brings an amazing on-the-go music experience. With dual front-facing stereo speakers, the IDOL 3 packs professional audio quality for true-to-life sound.

IDOL 3 has been specially tuned for leading color and image innovation through Technicolor Color Enhance technology, giving the IDOL 3 a vivid cinematic color experience. Get a clear view of your pictures and videos from any angle, even in direct sunlight

IDOL 3 comes packed with a 13MP main camera and wide-angle 8MP front camera that will excite even the most passionate photophilic with a full-featured camera application, including time-lapse, HDR, panoramic and manual mode

Powered by an Octa-Core Qualcomm Snapdragon 615 processor, the IDOL 3 delivers ultra-fast 4G LTE connectivity. Get lost in stunning HD video and console-quality gaming, made all the more realistic with 5.1 surround sound
Model OT-6045O, compatible with Micro SIM Cards

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars1,046 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
